function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information on virus and its impacts","Impact":"Inability to effectively handle the situation and mitigate the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Regular communication and collaboration with global health organizations to stay informed","Technologies":"Health information systems and data analytics for real-time monitoring","People":"Government agencies, public health officials, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Government agencies and global health organizations"},{"Description":"Shortages of health equipment and critical components","Impact":"Inability to provide necessary resources to contain the spread of the virus and treat patients","Mitigation":"Stockpiling essential medical supplies and establishing local manufacturing capabilities","Technologies":"3D printing for manufacturing medical equipment, supply chain management systems","People":"Healthcare facilities, manufacturers, and government agencies","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination and allocation of responsibilities between agencies","Impact":"Delayed decision making, implementation, and evaluation of crisis management activities","Mitigation":"Establishing clear allocation of responsibilities and regular joint training exercises","Technologies":"Project management software for coordination, communication tools for real-time collaboration","People":"Intelligence agencies, government officials, and emergency response teams","Owner":"Intelligence agencies and government agencies"}]}
